column1: The Pit Room////The gang of five wanted to find some great 'Q and boy does this place fit that description!  The brisket was tender and flavorful
column2: the beef sausage was on point
column3: pork ribs had us looking for more
column4: the frito pie didn't survive the encounter wit' us
column5: a couple tacos bit the dust
column6: the pinto beans ended up on a few plates
column7: cole slaw equaled everything else's 5 star rating.  A few beers and a glass of wine topped off this meat fest.  We'll be back.
